Creating the table and writing it to a csv file for question1
```{r}
StudentID <- 1410110001:1410111000
DepartmentID <- rep(1:10,100)
CGPA <- runif(1000,4,10)
inp <- cbind(StudentID,DepartmentID,CGPA)
write.csv(inp,"input.csv")
```

Reading from the csv file and finding the solution to question 1
```{r}
data <- read.csv("input.csv")
```
1.a
```{r}
percentageGreaterThan7.5 <- nrow(data[data$CGPA>7.5,])/nrow(data) *100
print(percentageGreaterThan7.5)

```

```{r}
percentageBet7.5and8.5 <- print(nrow(data[(data$CGPA-7.5) * (8.5-data$CGPA)>0,])/nrow(data) *100)
```
